## GlPointGraphicsComponent class

Draws points of varying sizes and colors.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class GlPointGraphicsComponent implements IGraphicsComponentSpecification<TGl2EntityRenderer, ICartesian2dUpdateArg<Float32Array>, TInterleavedPoint2dTrait<Float32Array>> 
```
